title: Sushi
details: Sliced raw fish over pressed vinegar rice.

title: Ramen
details: Noodles in savory broth topped with meat and vegetables.

title: Tempura
details: Battered and deep-fried seafood and vegetables.

title: Udon
details: Thick noodles in a hot soup broth topped with various ingredients.

title: Yakitori
details: Grilled chicken skewers seasoned with soy sauce.

title: Tonkatsu
details: Breaded and deep-fried pork cutlet served with rice and sauce.

title: Miso Soup
details: Hot soup made with miso paste and ingredients such as tofu and seaweed.

title: Gyoza
details: Pan-fried or steamed dumplings filled with meat and vegetables.

title: Okonomiyaki
details: Savory pancake filled with meat, seafood, and vegetables.

title: Katsu Curry
details: Japanese curry with breaded and deep-fried pork cutlet.

title: Pizza Margherita
details: A classic Neapolitan pizza made with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella cheese, and basil leaves.

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
details: A pasta dish made with spaghetti, pancetta, eggs, pecorino cheese, and black pepper.

title: Lasagna
details: A layered pasta dish made with tomato sauce, b√©chamel sauce, and ground meat or vegetables.

title: Risotto
details: A creamy rice dish made with butter, onion, white wine, and Parmesan cheese.

title: Osso Buco
details: A Milanese specialty made with braised veal shanks and gremolata (a mixture of lemon zest, garlic, and parsley).

title: Bruschetta
details: Grilled bread rubbed with garlic and topped with olive oil and diced tomatoes or other toppings.

title: Caprese Salad
details: A simple salad made with fresh mozzarella cheese, sliced tomatoes, and basil leaves.

title: Tiramisu
details: A dessert made with ladyfingers dipped in espresso and layered with mascarpone cheese and cocoa powder.

title: Pesto
details: A sauce made with basil, garlic, pine nuts, Parmesan cheese, and olive oil, traditionally served with pasta.

title: Minestrone Soup
details: A hearty vegetable soup made with beans, pasta, and various vegetables.
